backend/main.mo: Motoko canister handling online admissions and inquiries with ID generation, storage maps, and admin‑protected getters backed by authorization and blob‑storage mixins.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence listing required files, components, and test IDs for adding a Google Business Profile link and LocalBusiness JSON‑LD.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of all frontend files describing styling, pages, components, and recent SEO/GBP additions.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base layer defining OKLCH design tokens for light/dark themes and applying global background and border utilities.
frontend/index.html: Main HTML entry including SEO meta tags and LocalBusiness JSON-LD with NAP details and Google Business Profile URL.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router routes for all site pages inside a themed SiteLayout.
Admin access wrapper that checks Internet Identity and admin status, gating protected content with loading, login, or denial states.
frontend/src/components/admin/CsvExportB: Exports admissions or inquiries data to a CSV file using a generated Blob and download link.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Handles login/logout via Internet Identity and updates UI based on authentication and loading state.
frontend/src/components/facilities/Facil: Displays a facility card with an icon, title, and description.
frontend/src/components/forms/InquiryFor: Form for submitting inquiries with validation, service selection, and mutation handling.
frontend/src/components/forms/OnlineAdmi: Admission form with photo upload, validation, and submission to the backend.
frontend/src/components/gallery/Lightbox: Lightbox modal supporting image navigation, keyboard controls, and display of current index.
frontend/src/components/home/HeroMedia.t: Renders a looping hero video with fallback background image on error.
frontend/src/components/layout/CopyLinkB: Button that copies the current page link and updates icon and label based on copy status.
frontend/src/components/layout/Footer.ts: Footer with social links, navigation links, services, and contact information.
frontend/src/components/layout/HeaderNav: Responsive site header with logo, navigation links, CTAs, and a mobile sheet menu.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteLayou: Page wrapper providing the header, footer, and main content layout.
frontend/src/components/membership/Prici: Pricing card component showing plan details, features, and a CTA to start admission.
frontend/src/constants/branding.ts: Centralized branding config defining logo and favicon asset paths.
frontend/src/constants/contact.ts: Defines approved contact numbers and utilities for tel, WhatsApp, and display formatting.
frontend/src/constants/googleBusinessPro: Stores the Google Business Profile link and display label.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor with reactive identity handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdmissions.ts: Provides mutations and queries for submitting and fetching admissions and inquiries, plus admin checks.
frontend/src/hooks/useCopyPageLink.ts: Hook to copy the current page URL using the clipboard API with fallbacks.
frontend/src/hooks/useInquiries.ts: Mutation hook for submitting inquiries and invalidating related queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and provider managing Internet Identity login, stored identity loading, and status tracking.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind setup with luxury black‑and‑gold theme variables, marble backgrounds, and custom utility classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point initializing React, QueryClient, InternetIdentityProvider, and global styles.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPage.tsx: Admin dashboard showing admissions and inquiries with search, stats, tabs, and CSV export.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Displays address, phone, action buttons, and Google Maps embed for contacting the gym.
frontend/src/pages/ExtraPremiumFacilitie: Lists premium facility cards with icons and descriptions.
frontend/src/pages/GalleryPage.tsx: Gallery with category tabs, placeholder images, and a lightbox viewer.
frontend/src/pages/GymFacilitiesPage.tsx: Shows a grid of gym facilities using icon cards with descriptions.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Hero landing page with branding and navigation buttons plus SEO content sections.
frontend/src/pages/InquiryPage.tsx: Inquiry form page that shows a success message and WhatsApp link after submission.
frontend/src/pages/MassageTherapyPage.ts: Displays a massage services page with a grid of therapy offerings and a call-to-action section for booking by phone.
frontend/src/pages/MembershipPlansPage.t: Renders membership plans, group sessions, and steam session benefits using pricing cards and feature lists.
frontend/src/pages/OnlineAdmissionPage.t: Shows an online admission form and a success screen after submission with navigation options.
Presents restaurant and coffee offerings with a feature grid and a placeholder gallery.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility module for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session parameters, including hash-based parsing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending colors, fonts, animations, and layout settings with custom gold theme styling.
project_state.json: Holds the project’s versioned state, including site concept summary, architectural notes, unresolved issues, and a list of existing implemented features. Used to track requirements, design decisions, and pending fixes for the UBW luxury fitness website.
